name: Seeds of the Future
description:
Seeds of the future is a platformer without jumping. Instead of jumping, you throw seeds. When these seeds land you grow in the location they land. This game was made for Ludum Dare 46 with the theme "Keep it alive". Both the programming and the art was done in 72 hours.

Programming: Timothy Bosman

Art: Laura Bosman

Music: Kevin MacLeod

Parting of the Ways - Part 1 by Kevin MacLeod

Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4195-parting-of-the-ways---part-1

License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
